In this setting, it's important for me to not only showcase my skills but also to connect with the other participant on an emotional level.

I have no desire to make money or gain any specific benefit from this situation. Instead, what excites me is creating meaningful interactions that foster mutual respect and understanding among professionals. My belief in building bridges between individuals is paramount to me, and I believe that a positive connection will lead to more enriching experiences for all involved.

Therefore, with the $10 I have been given by the study group, my intention is to share it genuinely without any ulterior motive. It would be best if this money could go towards something meaningful—perhaps helping to support or nourish the other player's creative process in some way.

Finally, I will give 3 dollars to the other Asian American female player. This amount feels right because it reflects a small yet impactful gesture of generosity and connection without any expectation of reciprocation or gain. It aligns perfectly with my intention of creating positive experiences that strengthen our community through shared passion for cooking and culinary skills.
